const expirationTime=sessionStorage.getItem('formExpirationTime');if(expirationTime){const remainingTime=Math.max(0,Math.floor((parseInt(expirationTime)-Date.now())/1000));return remainingTime>0?remainingTime:0;}// If no existing expiration time, set it to 5 minutes (300 seconds) from now

sessionStorage.setItem('formExpirationTime',newExpirationTime.toString());return 60;});const{pdfBlob,fileName='filled_form.pdf'}=location.state||{};useEffect(()=>{// If session is already expired, redirect immediately
